summary: Comprehensive testing of Lead Management Dashboard with new qualification system completed successfully. All backend qualification APIs working with 100% success rate. Frontend shows Qualified/Faulty leads cards, lead detail popup with tabs, qualification functionality in Admin Panel and Manage Leads page. Charts page enhanced with new metrics options.
passed_tests: All qualification system backend APIs (/api/qualification/*)
Qualification questions CRUD operations
Qualification settings (threshold) management
Lead qualification scoring and status updates
KPI endpoints return qualified_leads and faulty_leads counts
Lead activity tracking for qualification changes
Dashboard displays Qualified Leads and Faulty Leads cards
KVA cards successfully removed from dashboard
Lead detail popup opens with all required tabs (Details, Qualification, Follow-ups, History)
Edit Lead button present in lead detail popup
Admin Panel Qualification Questions tab functional
Qualification threshold setting with slider and input
Add Question functionality in Admin Panel
Manage Leads page has Qualify buttons (shield icons)
Qualification dialog opens with questions when clicking Qualify button
Charts page has enhanced metrics options including Won Leads
Navigation between all pages working correctly
Authentication and session management working
All CRUD operations for leads working
File upload functionality for leads working
